About me

My name is Kasper and I’m a software developer. I’m mainly focused on blockchain space. Recently I’m mainly focused in Rust and I develop my pet projects in this langauge for 2 years.

During my carrer I had opportunity to use following technologies:

  • Spring Web
  • Spring Data
  • Spring Cloud
  • Angular
  • Kafka
  • Kafka Streams
  • Elasticsearch
